title: Create: Bells & Whistles
description: Additions and adornments for the modern Create engineer. Available for both Fabric & Forge!
body:
[![Bells and Whistles Banner](https://i.ibb.co/SVwFkB8/bellsandwhistles.png)](https://url-shortener.curseforge.com/FLd2G)

Create: Bells & Whistles

![available for 1.18.2-1.21.1](https://img.shields.io/badge/available%20for-1.18.2--1.21.1-992333) ![modloaders forge, neoforge, fabric and quilt](https://img.shields.io/badge/modloaders-Forge,%20Fabric%20&%20Quilt-992333) [![star](https://img.shields.io/badge/Star%20on%20GitHub-fafbfc?logo=github&logoColor=black)](https://github.com/sudoLev/BellsAndWhistlesMod) [![discord](https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-5865f2?logo=discord&logoColor=white)](https://discord.gg/ynQvWygqQT)
Create: Bells & Whistles is an add-on for the Create mod that focuses on the player experience, adding 36 new decorative and utility blocks. This page hosts both the Fabric and Forge versions of the mod.


A train built with a Deepslate Train Pilot and Brass Bogey Steps

Current list of features:

  • Station Platform block
    • Perfectly dimensioned for train or subway platforms
    • Mind the gap (but not actually)
    • Can be crafted or made in a stonecutter
  • Headlight
    • Can be placed on all faces of a block
  • 'Metro' Palette of blocks
    • Metro Casing, Corrugated Metro Casing
    • Metro Panel, Corrugated Metro Panel
    • Metro Trapdoor, Metro Window
    • Great for building subway or light rail cars
  • Andesite, Brass and Copper Grab Bar Blocks
    • Behave like ladders
    • Work on trains
    • Can be crafted or made in a stonecutter
  • Andesite, Brass and Copper Bogie Steps Blocks
    • Extend 1 block below where they are placed.
    • Behave like ladders
    • Work on trains
    • Can be crafted or made in a stonecutter
  • Andesite, Brass and Copper Door Step Blocks
    • Can be placed on literally any block
    • Can be crafted or made in a stonecutter
  • Ornate Iron Trapdoor
    • Good for windows
  • Train Pilot Blocks
    • Andesite Alloy
    • Brass
    • Copper
    • Metal (Textured in the style of the Metal Girder and Metal Bracket from Create)
    • Polished Andesite
    • Polished Granite
    • Polished Diorite
    • Polished Deepslate
    • Polished Tuff
    • Polished Calcite
    • Polished Limestone
    • Polished Scoria
    • Polished Scorchia
    • Polished Crimsite
    • Polished Ochrum
    • Polished Veridium
    • Polished Asurine
  • Station Platform block

Planned features:

  • None right now. Suggest something!
--- ### Translating Translation help is really appreciated. The best way to do so is to make a pull request with the translated lang file. The mod is currently available in English, German, Swedish and Korean. **Thanks to [@AsseyGithub](https://github.com/AsseyGithub "@AsseyGithub") for translating Create: Bells and Whistles to Korean.** --- **Thanks to [Renard Futé](https://github.com/RenardFute) for porting Bells & Whistles to 1.18.2.**
